TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void StylusSystemGestureEventHandler(object sender, StylusSystemGestureEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed StylusSystemGestureEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate

Docs.param: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusSystemGestureEventArgs"> that contains the event data.
Docs.summary: Represents the method that handles the <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement.StylusSystemGesture"> event of a <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>.
